items.description:

Det opplyser Norges Fotballforbund.
Hovda får også en sentral rolle i å følge opp NFFs strategi for jenter og kvinner

items.description: Matt Weston underlined his status as the world's best skeleton pilot by setting the track record on his way to taking a significant halfway lead at the Winter Olympics.
